abilities.name: Power Cheer
abilities.text: The attacks of your Pokémon-GX in play that evolve from Eevee do 30 more damage to your opponent's Active Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance). You can't apply more than 1 Power Cheer Ability at a time.

attacks.name: Flamethrower
attacks.text: Discard an Energy from this Pokémon.
